Package org.drip.market.definition

Class FloaterIndex

java.lang.Object
org.drip.market.definition.FloaterIndex
Direct Known Subclasses:
IBORIndex, OvernightIndex
public abstract class FloaterIndex
extends java.lang.Object
FloaterIndex contains the definitions of the floating rate indexes of different jurisdictions.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics Library
  • Project = Static Market Fields - the Definitions, the OTC/Exchange Traded Products, and Treasury Settings
  • Package = IBOR, FX, Overnight Index Container
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
